thread.title: Price has 2nd shutout in 3 games, Canadiens win 7th straight
thread.title_full: Price has 2nd shutout in 3 games, Canadiens win 7th straight

title: Price has 2nd shutout in 3 games, Canadiens win 7th straight
text: Price has 2nd shutout in 3 games, Canadiens win 7th straight Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) Carey Price made 38 saves for his second shutout in his last three starts and Alex Semin scored his first goal as the Montreal Canadiens defeated the St. Louis Blues 3-0 on Tuesday night to win their team-record seventh in a row to begin the season. Watch highlights of the Canadiens' seventh straight win.
